thread.title: John Mayer sets Houston date

author: chron.com
title: John Mayer sets Houston date

Photo: Jeff Daly, WENN.com Image 1 of / 70 70 >>Keep clicking for a look at other great concerts coming to Houston. >>Keep clicking for a look at other great concerts coming to Houston. Photo: Jeff Daly, WENN.com Image 2 of 70 Upcoming concerts in Houston for 2017
Houston's concert scene rarely slows down. From Jimmy Buffett to Willie Nelson to Chance the Rapper to Demi Lovato, there is a performer from nearly every genre coming to town. Continue clicking to see the concerts that are bringing their music to the Bayou City. less Upcoming concerts in Houston for 2017

Electric performer and pop star Bruno Mars comes to Toyota Center on Oct. 24. Photo: James Nielsen, Staff Image 70 of 70 John Mayer sets Houston date 1 / 70 Back to Gallery John Mayer has lined up an August 6 date at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion on his Search for Everything World Tour. The shows are rather elaborate in structure, as Mayer will perform three sets: one solo, one in a trio setting and one with his full band.
And Mayer's newest album is also being released through an interesting and different approach. Mayer is issuing "The Search for Everything" in segments. The first was released in late-January. The second became available today, Feb. 24. The full album will be released April 14.
Tickets go on sale at 10 a.m. March 4 through Live Nation .
